en.name: Symphonist of Scents
en.passiveDescription: ATK is increased by {{12//15//18//21//24%}}. When the equipping character is off-field, ATK is increased by an additional {{12//15//18//21//24%}}. After initiating healing, the equipping character and the character(s) they have healed will obtain the “Sweet Echoes” effect, increasing their ATK by {{32//40//48//56//64%}} for 3s. This effect can be triggered even if the equipping character is off-field.

zh.name: 香韵奏者
zh.passiveDescription: 攻击力提升{{12//15//18//21//24%}}；当装备此武器的角色处于队伍后台时，攻击力额外提升{{12//15//18//21//24%}}。进行治疗后，装备者与受到治疗的角色会获得「甘美回奏」的效果，攻击力提升{{32//40//48//56//64%}}，持续3秒。装备者处于队伍后台时，依然能触发上述效果
